text: int main ( ) { int m , n , q , ans ; int t , i , j ; int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] = { 0 } ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & m ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < m ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = m - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = i ; j >= 0 ; j -- ) { if ( a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] > a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) { a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; } else a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < 100 ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) a [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; } return 0 ; }
